content: Tooling vendors (e.g. @Michel Rutten @Ewout Kramer @Christiaan Knaap ) shoud not that with the impending release of technical corrections for R2, R3, and R4, the patch versions will increment....
I expect that to cause a cascade of issues....
Thanks for the heads-up @Grahame Grieve , we'll keep an eye on it.
Yes, I'm expecting StructureDefinition.fhirVersion to be bumped. Or do you mean something else?
